relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: S1, S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, tender to palpation in epigastric and RUQ, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: CNs intact, motor function grossly normal

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: In the morning, pain was worse and epigastric tenderness was worse.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pain reported as sharper and crampy, worsening after eating dinner prior to ED visit.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient is resting comfortably in bed. Reports relief of pain with Tylenol and compazine.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Appetite improvement noted, willingness to try crackers or bread.
